com.apw.Steering

Interface Steerable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SteeringBase, SteeringMk1, SteeringMk2, SteeringModule

    public interface Steerable
    Interface to allow multiple versions of steering code.
    Author:
    kevin, carl, nathan
    See Also:
    SteeringBase

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double curveSteepness(double turnAngle)
      Gets how steep a turn will be.
      int drive(int[] pixels) 
      void findPoints(int[] pixels)
      Find, and process the image data to assign Points to leftPoints, rightPoints, and midPoints.

    • Method Detail

      • curveSteepness

        double curveSteepness(double turnAngle)
        Gets how steep a turn will be. 1.0 being the sparest turn, 0 being no turn.
        Parameters:
        turnAngle - angle from center line to furthest point
        Returns:
        how steep the turn will be

      • drive

        int drive(int[] pixels)

      • findPoints

        void findPoints(int[] pixels)
        Find, and process the image data to assign Points to leftPoints, rightPoints, and midPoints.
        Parameters:
        pixels - An array of pixels
